notes.body:
We're still digging into this, and we'll return in 30 minutes with another update.

If you're trying to sign in via email, you can login here: https://slack.com/workspace-signin, if you know your email, password, and workspace URL (example.slack.com). You can also sign in with the SSO, Google, or Apple options, if applicable.
Some users are unable to receive emails from Slack. We're working to fix this, and we'll be back with an update within 30 minutes.
